The video clip shows hundreds of scorpio: which is claimed to be from Rajasthan.
Alt News reverse: searched a frame from the video clip on Google and found an article in Gujarati stating that thousands of scorpions were found in a home in Anandpur village in Gujarat.
FactCrescendo: a fact-checking organization, posted a video report of the incident reported by the Gujarati news channel Sandesh, confirming that the scorpions were found in Gujarat.
The expert: s verdict concludes that the video showing numerous scorpions inside a room is from Ahmedabad district in Gujarat and not from Rajasthan.
